description:
Various remedial works and stabilisation of the structure.  New light well and railings to the Bromfield Street elevation.  (Listed Building Consent application reference P112337 also submitted).


PLEASE NOTE:   Consultation letter recently sent to you on 31 October 2011 should have referred only to remedial works and stabilisation of the structure.  An application for the Change of Use from a former Public House to a single dwelling house will be received in due course for which you will also receive a consultation letter.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  The facing materials of the alterations to the building hereby approved shall match the existing building in terms of colour, texture, appearance and architectural detailing and shall be maintained as such thereafter.  

REASON:  To ensure that the appearance of the building is acceptable in accordance with policies: 7.6 of the London Plan 2011, policies D4, D11 and D24 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002 and policies CS9A, B and G and CS10F of the Islington Core Strategy 2011.
